original_text: Jehoahaz was twenty-three years old when he began to reign, and he reigned three months in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 여호아하스가 왕위에 오를 때에 나이가 이십삼 세더라 그가 예루살렘에서 다스린 지 석 달에

sentences.original_text: Jehoahaz was twenty-three years old when he began to reign
and he reigned three months in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 예루살렘에서 석 달 동안 통치하였습니다
